content.html: this is not even an opinion, this is an actual scientific fact: dogs laugh (it sounds like panting, but it's irregular, breathier—like a laugh!) to bond or to initiate play, and if you do it at them, they will lose their MINDS
content.value: this is not even an opinion, this is an actual scientific fact: dogs laugh (it sounds like panting, but it's irregular, breathier—like a laugh!) to bond or to initiate play, and if you do it at them, they will lose their MINDS
